trans-unit.source: Paints an area with a solid color.

For convenience, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes> class provides a set of commonly used <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> objects, such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Blue%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Yellow%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes>类提供了一组常用<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush>对象，如<xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Blue%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Yellow%2A>。

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> class provides several special features: <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **可冻结功能：**从继承，因此<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>类，<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush>类提供了一些特殊功能：<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush>可以声明对象，为在多个对象，进行只读的以提高之间共享性能，克隆，并进行线程安全。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关提供的不同功能的详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
XAML Values
*predefinedBrushName*
The name of a brush defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes> class, such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Blue%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Orange%2A>.
*rgb*
A three-digit hexadecimal number that describes this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 描述此画笔的由三位十六进制数字<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The first digit specifies the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the second digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the third digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 第一个数字指定的颜色<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>值，第二个数字指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>值，且第三个数字，则指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: For example, `00F`.
*argb*
A four-digit hexadecimal number that describes this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 描述此画笔的四位十六进制数字<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The first digit specifies the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A> value, the second digit specifies its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final digit specifies its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 第一个数字指定的颜色<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>值，第二个数字指定其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>值下, 一步的数字指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>值，且最后一个数字，则指定其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: For example, `F00F`.
*rrggbb*
A six-digit hexadecimal number that describes this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 一个六位数的十六进制数字，描述此画笔的<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The first two digits specify the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 前两个数字指定的颜色<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>值，后面的两个指定其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>值和最终的两个指定其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: For example, `0000FF`.
*aarrggbb*
An eight-digit hexadecimal number that describes this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 描述此画笔的八位十六进制数字<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The first two digits specify the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 前两个数字指定的颜色<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>值，后面的两个指定其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>值，后面的两个指定其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>值和最终的两个指定其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: For example, `FF0000FF`.
*scA*
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> value of this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
*scR*
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A> value of this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
*scG*
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> value of this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
*scB*
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A> value of this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
*profileUri*
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile.
*alphaValue*
The alpha channel color value.
The value range is from 0.0 through 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 值范围是从 0.0 到 1.0 之间。

trans-unit.source: *colorValue*
A comma-delimited list of three to eight values that represent the color channels of the color profile.
trans-unit.target: 以逗号分隔的列表，表示的颜色配置文件的颜色通道的三到 8 个值。

trans-unit.source: The value range is from 0.0 through 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 值范围是从 0.0 到 1.0 之间。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" /> class with no color or animations.
trans-unit.target: 不使用任何颜色或动画初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The color to apply to the fill.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
Gets or sets the color of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" /> 的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The brush's color.
The default value is <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Colors.Transparent" />.
For a list of predefined colors, see the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors> class.
trans-unit.target: 预定义颜色的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors>类。

trans-unit.source: For a list of system colors, see the <xref:System.Windows.SystemColors> class.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color" /> dependency property.
The binary reader to read the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" /> from.
trans-unit.target: 要从其中读取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" /> 的二进制读取器。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基础结构，但不能在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: The deserialized <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" />.
